title: I'm looking for a coach
body:
Hi i have been playing this game for 2 years now and i still fell like im no were near as good as i should be. Im looking for a gold or even plat. player to help me figure out my mistakes and misplays. I can pay with RP and gifts if you want. I don't have real money to give but i feel like RP is a good trade. Plzzzzz I really need this.. Im B3 i want to be in gold at least.

Plz. help The Tomoki Tower

replies.body: I analyze games and coach. Happy to help you climb the ladder, however; just know that progress takes time and you will not improve overnight. improving your game takes a lot of self-dedication prior to coaching. You have to listen and then apply what you have learned over and over. Let me know if you are interested.
